analysis.Summary: IconInfo.vue is a Vue 3 single-file component that renders an SVG “info” icon. It accepts a fill color prop to customize the icon’s color.
analysis.Purpose: To provide a reusable, configurable “info” icon for navigation or other UI areas within the martyrs-based application.

Components.name: IconInfo
Components.role: Root Vue component rendering an SVG with three <path> elements forming an info symbol

fill.description: Color applied to the SVG paths via the :fill binding

Dependencies: Global CSS variable --black (used for default fill color)
analysis.Usage: Imported where needed, e.g.: import IconInfo from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconInfo.vue'; then used in templates as <IconInfo fill="#f00"/> or relying on the default.
Notes: No dedicated <style> block—presentation relies on SVG attributes and CSS variables
Purely presentational; no state, computed properties or event handling
Part of the navigation icon set located at modules/icons/navigation
